description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Cooked In Coriander Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Chicken Cooked In Coriander Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Put the yoghurt, coriander, and 1 tablespoon of the curry powder in a large bowl. Season with salt and black pepper, and mix well. Add the chicken pieces, and leave to marinate for a few minutes.
Sit the coated chicken pieces in a roasting tin, and roast in the oven for about 30 minutes until cooked through and lightly charred.

Meanwhile, tip the potatoes into a separate roasting tin. Drizzle over the olive oil, and add the remaining curry powder. Mix together using your hands, then roast in the oven for about 20 minutes until golden.
Serve the chicken and potatoes together with a sprinkling of extra coriander and the lemon wedges. Serve a crisp green salad on the side, if you wish.
